reviewText:
I really wasn't expecting much from this anime, it sounded pretty cliche and I haven't seen a die for anime in ages,however the story, animation and character were splendid!

I don't have the time to type the summary, you can read about the plot anywhere.

No spoilers, the story was interesting, cliffhangers in nearly every episode, awesome art and animation.
A real thriller ride.
Reminded me of Code Geass and Guilty Crown.
If you love action, romance, and being glued to your chair, check out Blast of Tempest.

Buy it for only $59 on rightstuf site.
